entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8 except temperature rising to plus 2 over southwestern sections.
entry.summary: A few clouds except cloudy over northwestern sections. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southwestern sections overnight. Low minus 8 except temperature rising to plus 2 over southwestern sections. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1 except plus 2 over southwestern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1 except plus 2 over southwestern sections. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
